bibl.title: Letter from Carolyn Townsend to Laura Armistead Carter, January 13, 1928

div1.p: Townsend relates family news to Laura Carter. She sends a clipping on great names in preventive medicine, including Henry Carter.

div1.head: Letter from Carolyn Townsend to Laura Armistead Carter, January 13, 1928
div1.p:
Perhaps you will be
interested in the enclosed
clipping. Jim and I more.
Did you have a happy, gay,
Christmas? We went to
Carolina where Jim could
do some hunting. Although
he has a wonderful
disposition he and the
Arkansas climate fail
to agree-

Jim joins me in
wishing you a very
happy new year.
